issue.title: [Rust] Propagate `custom_metadata` field from IPC message
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, the custom metadata field in the Schema IPC message is not propagated from the IPC message to the internal data type. To be closer to parity compared to the other implementations it would be good to add the necessary logic to serialize and deserialize.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7268?focusedCommentId=16983672) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5907
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5907>
